message.content:
cs.HC, cs.RO, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

This paper focuses on gaze-based human-robot interaction, which involves both human-computer interaction (HCI) and robotics. Therefore, cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a novel approach to detect human intention using computer vision techniques, which falls under cs.CV (Computer Vision). The approach involves classification, which is a common task in machine learning, falling under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the paper applies the proposed approach to robotics, specifically human-robot interaction, which falls under cs.RO (Robotics).
